simplified: 吃人家的嘴软，拿人家的手短
traditional: 吃人家的嘴軟，拿人家的手短
pinyin: chi1 ren2 jia1 de5 zui3 ruan3 , na2 ren2 jia1 de5 shou3 duan3

definitions.chi1 ren2 jia1 de5 zui3 ruan3 , na2 ren2: lit. the mouth that has been fed by others is soft, the hand that has received doesn't reach (idiom); fig. one is partial to those from whom presents have been accepted;
